::Prowl/Killer/Annihilator

Annihilator screams as Prowl's weapon digs into his side. He stumbles back, 
mech fluid stilling on the floor. Firing off a few shots at Prowl from his 
pistol, he launches himself into the air, flying at Iron Raptor, firing his 
gun rapidly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer yells in pain as teeth dig into his torso, very nearly ripping him in 
two pieces. His fist closes over his launcher, bending the trigger into a 
firing position. The launcher falls to the ground, firing at everything in 
front of it (Iron Raptor, Killer, etc...).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl stumbles back as Annihilator's shots hit him, denting his chest plate 
and stomach. He growls and jumps into the air, heading for Annihilator.
